personal.name: Lisan Hsn
personal.title: AI-Leveraged Full Stack Developer
personal.tagline: Crafting intelligent solutions through code and AI collaboration

about.intro: Self-taught developer with 4+ years of experience building scalable web applications and intelligent systems. Based in Sydney, I believe in leveraging AI tools not as a replacement for skill, but as a force multiplier for creativity and efficiency.
about.story: My journey began in 2021 when I decided to transition from marketing to tech. What started as curiosity about web development evolved into a passion for creating meaningful digital experiences. I've embraced AI tools early in my journey, recognizing their potential to accelerate learning and enhance code quality.
about.philosophy: I approach development with a growth mindset, constantly learning and adapting to new technologies. My unique perspective combines human creativity with AI assistance, resulting in innovative solutions that are both technically sound and user-focused.
achievements: Reduced development time by 40% through AI-assisted coding
